Posts.Content: Not sure it is totally possible.. but Ladies educate me..  My new twice weekly routine is the get a 1/2 pint of blood removed.  So far this is done in either the infusion area or hematology area.  I see many women getting infusions... usually all alone. (sad).  Do or should I acknowledge them at all..?  Ignore them or give them a thumbs up, or..??    Obviously I am sensitive to what they are going through.. and do not want to add to their stress..  Thanks.. Ron - still a Neaderthal at times...
Posts.Title: Ladies Educate Me please..
